General.Name: Amoy Diagnostics Co Ltd
General.Description: Amoy Diagnostics Co., Ltd., a diagnostic company, focuses on molecular diagnostics for oncology precision medicine in China and internationally. The company offers NGS, real-time PCR, FISH, and extraction assays. Amoy Diagnostics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Xiamen, China.

1.Name: Ms. Ying  Chen
1.Title: CFO & Sec. to the Board of Directors
